body.name: Yumkfoi 2-in-1 Bedside Shelf, Height Adjustable Bunk Bed Shelf Table for Top Bunk, Wooden Clip On Nightstand Tray Table Caddy Organizer for Bedroom College Dorm Essentials (Rotatable & Liftable)

features: 【Dual Purpose Bed Shelf】Want to use it by the bedside or floating over the bed? It can fulfill both! This clip on bedside table is 360 degree rotatable and liftable, with height adjustable range 11"-18", giving you the flexibility to adapt it according to your habits. Whether you want it next to your bed for temporary storage or raise it up as a table for easy reading and catching up on TV, it does with ease

【Large Functional Tray】16"x10.5" extra large tray with low edges on all sides, keeps items in place no falling off. Removable book stand and dedicated slots for phones or tablets free up your hands and effortlessly meet your reading or binge-watching needs. Spill-proof cup holder safely holds your drink. Four side USB cable slots enable the mobile phone charging cable to be well fixed

【Bed Rail Storage Solution】Only suitable for beds with hard bed rails between 0.6"-2", including most dorm beds, bunk beds and bed frames, otherwise it won't fit firmly. The soft silicone on the clip won't scratch your bed frame. This bedside table is lightweight and compact, assembly requied, which is one of the must-haves for bedroom, college dorm room, nightstand for teen room or side table for kids

【Durable and Reliable】Made of 100% solid wood and study metal, well structured, stable and sturdy, designed to last, easy to clean, safe to use with all surface and edges finely polished. A preferred choice for bed side organization and storage, especially help small space dwellers make the most out of space, from those in tiny bedrooms to college students in need of a top bunk bedside table

【More Ways to Use】Forget getting out of bed or climbing down from the top bunk just to grab something across the room or on the floor. With this handy bedside table, tablet, phone, books, alarm clock, drinks, or any other items you may bring with you in bed can be just an arm's length away. This bedside shelf can provide an instant nightstand or desk while saving your floor space, making it an ideal alternative for narrow rooms or bunk bed nightstands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Took just a few mins to assemble. 2 mins to use a power drill to screw in the 4 little screws. one min to attach to the bed frame. That's it. I enveloped it with a pillow cover that I got with the bed sheet set, so, it now looks like an extension of my bed. I was able to adjust the height to bring it just above my mattress and lock it in that position. It's cool that I can rotate it, if needed. Am planning to attach headset holder and a few other things to optimize the space. Very impressed overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited about this because I could lift the level of the table to where I needed it. Unfortunately it is so unsturdy there is no way I could put a drink on it. No matter how tight I put it, the metal part that holds it on the bed will tilt with the slightest touch. Unfortunately I’ll have to return this one. The company was very helpful and tried to resolve the issue. Definitely above and beyond on customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Stayed tight on the bed frame . Moved up and down so it can go over you and zings out of the way , has a convenient pull out shelf on side to be able to add more things .. great to place to put a laptop on .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect table for reading gaming or writing!
reviews.reviewText: Product is nice sturdy and swivels so you can put it to the side when not using without the need to take apart. Good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars WHEN COMPLETED CONNECTING THIS TO THE BED FRAME ITS NOT VERY STURDY
reviews.reviewText: This product is great in theory but not very sturdy when attached

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great space saver
reviews.reviewText: I got rid of my nightstand because my room was getting to be a little too crowded. This was perfect. I just need somewhere to put my glasses and my phone. Don’t take up any space on the floor and it works for us very well. You can literally put it anywhere on your bedframe. This is also good for someone who has a bunkbed and needs a flat surface to put something. My daughter keeps asking for it for her bunkbed because she likes to take water to bed, but it keeps spilling into her bed. I might have to get her a second one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working from bed
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to do work in bed, my dog got tired of me leaning my laptop on him, and now I don’t have to worry about him stepping on it in the bed. Luckily I have the perfect type of bed for this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Yumkfoi 2-in-1 Bedside Shelf is a game-changer! The height-adjustable feature and sturdy wooden clip make it perfect for my top bunk. Easy assembly, top-notch quality, and a stylish design make it a five-star addition to any bunk bed setup. Highly recommend!
